DASHBOARD.TITLE: Dashboard
DASHBOARD.SUBTITLE: Welcome to your LinShare admin dashboard

MANAGE_USERS.TITLE: Manage users
MANAGE_USERS.SUBTITLE: User list
MANAGE_USERS.DESCRIPTION: This view allows you to find different domain's users. You can change roles, firstname, lastname and default languages, as well as upload permissions
MANAGE_USERS.SEARCH_GUIDE: You should enter an user information (ex: email) in the search field.
MANAGE_USERS.NAVIGATE_GUIDE: Click on the user to access to his profile.

DETAIL_USER.TITLE: Manage user
DETAIL_USER.CONFIRM_DELETE: You are about to delete this user, this procedure is irreversible and destroy all his document. Do you want to proceed?
DETAIL_USER.LOCKED_USER_DESCRIPTION: This user is locked due to failed login attempts
DETAIL_USER.AUTHOR: Author
DETAIL_USER.RESTRICTED_CONTACTS_LIST_REQUIRED: For restricted guest, his restricted contacts list must contain at least one contact
DETAIL_USER.GUEST_EXPIRATION_DATE_VALIDATION_MESSAGE: Guest expiration date must be between tomorrow and {date}

ERRORS.COMMON_MESSAGE: Something went wrong. Please try again later!
ERRORS.FORBIDDEN: You do not have permission to access this resource.

AUTH.1004: Your account has been locked due to failed login attempts

FORCE_CREATION_MODAL.MESSAGE: Please set up Second Factor Authentication for your account to continue.

ALERT.TITLE: Second Factor Authentication required
ALERT.MESSAGE: Second Factor Authentication is required for your account. Please enable Second Factor Authentication to continue.

ALERT.TITLE: Cannot delete Shared Key
ALERT.MESSAGE: Shared key cannot be removed because Second Factor Authentication is required for your account. Please contact support for more information.

MANAGE_SHARED_SPACES.TITLE: Workspaces and Workgroups
MANAGE_SHARED_SPACES.DESCRIPTION: A workgroup is a collaborating space that contains internal or guest users. A workspace contains workgroups with the default member list. A workgroup can be inside a workspace or standalone. This view allows you to manage workspaces, workgroups and their members. LinShare administrators are not allowed to access the workgroup content (files or folders). The uploaded files in a workgroup are owned by the workgroup, not to the user. Therefore, they do not affect the user allowed quota.

MEMBERS.CONFIRM_DELETE: Are you sure you want to remove this member from shared space?
MEMBERS.FILTER_PLACEHOLDER: Search or filter shared space members

QUOTA.USER_MAX_FILE_SIZE: User's max upload file size in Personal Space

ERROR.QUOTA_LESS_THAN_FILE_SIZE: Storage quota must be larger than max file size
ERROR.FILE_SIZE_LARGER_THAN_QUOTA: Max file size must be smaller than storage quota

DELETE.MODAL_CHILD_EXISTS_TEXT: Please remove all nested domains (sub-domains and guest domain) of this domain before deleting
DELETE.MODAL_CONFIRM_TEXT: You are about to delete this domain, this procedure is irreversible and destroy all related data (documents, users, ...). Do you want to proceed?

FIELDS.NAME: Name
FIELDS.NAME_MAX_LENGTH: Domain name must be shorter than 256 characters
FIELDS.NOTIFICATION_LANGUAGE_HELPER: Notification emails will be sent in this language for all newly created users on this domain.
FIELDS.DEFAULT_USER_ROLE_HELPER: This role will be assigned to all newly created users on this domain.

WARNING.PAGE_NOT_ACCESSIBLE: This page is not accessible for current domain or user

CREATE_MODAL.FOOTER_NOTE: The domain will be created with default values, for example default role or locale, etc... After creating domain, please edit the domain and its parameters for more advanced settings
CREATE_MODAL.DOMAIN_POLICY_AUTO_TOOLTIP: If enabled, a rule will be created automatically by authorizing the newly created domain to communicate with itself only. All other communications are forbidden by default. If disabled, the default domain policy will be applied. It will allow all other domains to see this domain.

DOMAIN.REMOTE_FILTERS_HELPER: Remote filters can be used by any domain

FIELDS.PROVIDED_URL_HELPER: Please enter your Twake app base url, f.i https://my.twake.com

REMOTE_SERVER.DELETE_CONFIRM: You are about to delete this remote server connection, this procedure is irreversible. Do you want to proceed?
REMOTE_SERVER.DELETE_ABORT: This connection is associated with at least one of the providers. You cannot delete.
REMOTE_SERVER.NO_ASSOCIATED_DOMAIN: There is no domain using this connection.

BETA.MENU_TITLE: The development of this new interface is in progress, go to the old version for all configuration menus.
BETA.CONFIRM_MESSAGE: This feature is not yet available on this version. Do you want to access the old version to continue?

FORM.SEARCH_USER_QUERY_HELPER: LDAP query to search for users
FORM.AUTOCOMPLETE_QUERY_HELPER: LDAP queries to autocomplete an user using either all attributes or only first name and last name
FORM.ATTRIBUTES_HELPER: A mapping of LinShare user attribute to LDAP directory attribute

LDAP.PAGE_HELPER_P1: After creating a connection to a LDAP directory, it is necessary to create an user filter.
LDAP.PAGE_HELPER_P2: This pattern will allow you to define the correspondence between attributes of LinShare users and your directory attributes. Furthermore, LinShare requires 4 different queries to work properly.

USER_FILTER.DELETE_CONFIRM: You are about to delete this User filter, this procedure is irreversible. Do you want to proceed?
USER_FILTER.DELETE_ABORT: This user filter is accociated with at least one domain. You cannot delete.

USER_PROVIDER.EMPTY_MESSAGE: There is no user provider created for this domain
USER_PROVIDER.EMPTY_MESSAGE_GUEST_DOMAIN: Creating a Twake guest provider is optional. By creating Twake guest provider, guest users will then be provided by Twake. Users will no longer be able to create guests for this domain.
USER_PROVIDER.ERROR_MESSAGE: Failed to fetch user provider data of this domain
USER_PROVIDER.DELETE_CONFIRM: You are about to delete this user provider, this procedure is irreversible. Do you want to proceed?

LDAP.BASE_DN_HELPER: LinShare will start looking for users from this position in your LDAP

OIDC.ASSOCIATED_DOMAIN_ID_HELPER: By creating OIDC user provider for {name}, you allow LinShare to create users for this domain when an user authenticates with OIDC
OIDC.USED_DOMAIN_ID: This domain identifier has already been used in another domain

TWAKE.COMPANY_ID_HELPER: LinShare will retrieve users from this company in Twake

GROUP_FILTER.DELETE_CONFIRM: You are about to delete this group filter, this procedure is irreversible. Do you want to proceed?
GROUP_FILTER.DELETE_ABORT: This filter is associated with at least one group provider. You cannot delete.
GROUP_FILTER.NO_ASSOCIATED_DOMAIN: There is no domain using this group filter

LDAP.PAGE_HELPER_P1: LinShare support automatical synchronization between LinShare workgroups and LDAP groups. Workgroups and workgroup members are therefore created and synchronized with their LDAP counterpart. By default, members are given reader role.
LDAP.PAGE_HELPER_P2: LinShare requires the queries below to synchronize:
LDAP.PAGE_HELPER_P3: LQL query (LDAP Query Language) to search all workgroups
LDAP.PAGE_HELPER_P4: LQL query to search a workgroup

FORM.WORKGROUP_SEARCH_HELPER: LDAP queries and parameters to search for all workgroups or a single workgroup
FORM.PREFIX_HELPER: The prefix text to be stripped form workgroup name
FORM.SEARCH_PAGE_SIZE_ERROR: Page size must be at least 1

GROUP_PROVIDER.ERROR_MESSAGE: Failed to fetch group provider data of this domain

LDAP.BASE_DN_HELPER: LinShare will start looking for workgroups from this position in your LDAP

WORKSPACE_FILTER.NO_ASSOCIATED_DOMAIN: There is no workspace provider using this filter

LDAP.PAGE_HELPER_P1: LinShare support automatical synchronization between LinShare workspaces and LDAP workspaces. Workspaces and workspace members are therefore created and synchronized with their LDAP counterpart. By default, members are given reader role.
LDAP.PAGE_HELPER_P2: LinShare requires the queries below to synchronize:
LDAP.PAGE_HELPER_P3: LQL query (LDAP Query Language) to search for all workspaces
LDAP.PAGE_HELPER_P4: LQL query to search for a workspace

FORM.WORK_SPACE_SEARCH_HELPER: LDAP queries and parameters to search for all workspaces or a single workspace
FORM.PREFIX_HELPER: The prefix text to be stripped form workspace name
FORM.SEARCH_PAGE_SIZE_ERROR: Page size must be at least 1

WORKSPACE_PROVIDER.ERROR_MESSAGE: Failed to fetch workspace provider data of this domain

LDAP.BASE_DN_HELPER: LinShare will start looking for workspaces from this position in your LDAP
